products.name: Inory Sherwani
products.description: An inory silk sherwani. The jacket features geometric and floral artworks gleaned from archival chikan-kari textile fragments. It is paired with a textured kurta, slim pants and handcrafted shoes. The look is completed with an embroidered dushala.
